title: NASA's Perseverance Rover Collects First Mars Rock Sample
summary: The rover has successfully drilled and collected its first rock core that will be returned to Earth in a future mission.

title: Astronomers Discover Earth-like Planet in Habitable Zone
summary: Scientists have found a potentially habitable exoplanet orbiting a nearby star, showing signs of water in its atmosphere.

title: SpaceX Successfully Launches Starship Prototype
summary: The latest test flight of SpaceX's Starship prototype has achieved new milestones in the development of the Mars-bound spacecraft.

title: James Webb Space Telescope Reveals Stunning Images of Distant Galaxy
summary: The newest space telescope has captured unprecedented details of a galaxy formation from the early universe.
